item.title: [Python] pymongo ssh è·³æ¿æœºè¿è¿œç¨‹ mongodb æ•°æ®åº“ä¸€ç›´ timeoutï¼Ÿæœ‰æœ‰ç»éªŒçš„ä¼™è®¡å¸®å¿™çœ‹çœ‹å—ï¼Ÿ
item.description:
# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-

import pymongo
import urllib.parse
import logging
from sshtunnel import open_tunnel, SSHTunnelForwarder

sshHost = "1.2.3.4"
sshPort = 4022
sshUser = "sshUser"
sshPass = "sshPass"

mongoHost = '4.5.6.7'
mongoPort = 27017
mongoUser = urllib.parse.quote_plus('root')
mongoPass = urllib.parse.quote_plus('pass123')

server = SSHTunnelForwarder(
    (sshHost, sshPort),
    ssh_username=sshUser,
    ssh_password=sshPass,
    remote_bind_address=(mongoHost, mongoPort),
)

# server =  open_tunnel(
#     (sshHost, sshPort),
#     ssh_username=sshUser,
#     ssh_password=sshPass,
#     remote_bind_address=(mongoHost, mongoPort),
#     local_bind_address=('0.0.0.0', 10022)
# )
server.start()
# mongoDSN = 'mongodb://%s:%s@localhost:10022/dbname?authSource=admin' % (mongoUser, mongoPass)
# client = pymongo.MongoClient(mongoDSN, server.local_bind_port)
client = pymongo.MongoClient(
    '127.0.0.1', 
    server.local_bind_port, 
    username=mongoUser, 
    password=mongoPass, 
    authSource='admin'
)
db = client[dbName]

å…ˆç”¨æ³¨é‡Šæ‰çš„ä»£ç è¯•äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œæ€»æç¤ºï¼š

Could not establish connection from local ('127.0.0.1', 10022) to remote ('4.5.6.7', 27017) side of the tunnel: open new channel ssh error: SSH session not active

å†æç¤ºï¼špymongo.errors.ServerSelectionTimeoutError: 127.0.0.1:10022: [WinError 10061] ç”±äºç›®æ ‡è®¡ç®—æœºç§¯ææ‹’ç»ï¼Œæ— æ³•è¿æ¥ã€‚

æœªæ³¨é‡Šçš„ä»£ç å°±æç¤ºpymongo.errors.ServerSelectionTimeoutError: 4.5.6.7:27017: timed out
